oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development of the high sensitive fluorescence cell for measurement of atomic isotope shifts and hyperfine structures using laser spectroscopy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: HEMALATHA, M
KAILAS, S
VENUGOPALAN, A
JAGATAP, BN
MANOHAR, KG
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: online
high resolution
high sensitivity
fluorescence cell
cs-133
laser induced fluorescence
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A highly sensitive fluorescence cell has been developed for atomic isotope shift measurements on stable and exotic isotopes. It has been tested for offline experiments with the stable isotope Cs-133. The sensitivity and the resolution of the present laser induced fluorescence set-up have been measured. (c) 2006
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: NUCLEAR INSTRUMENTS & METHODS IN PHYSICS RESEARCH SECTION A-ACCELERATORS SPECTROMETERS DETECTORS AND ASSOCIATED EQUIPMENT, 572(2), 971-977
